displayName.french: Ce qui se cache sous terre

description.english: Enter the Sewers.
description.german: Betreten Sie die Kanalisation.
description.french: Entrez dans les égouts.
description.spanish: Adéntrate en las alcantarillas.
description.schinese: 进入下水道。
description.brazilian: Entre nos esgotos.

description.english: Defeat the Lesser Demon of the Sewers.
description.german: Besiegen Sie den Niederen Dämon in der Kanalisation.
description.french: Battez le démon mineur des égouts.
description.spanish: Derrota al demonio menor de las alcantarillas.
description.schinese: 击败下水道里的小恶魔。
description.brazilian: Derrote o Demônio Inferior do Esgoto.

description.english: Enter the Catacombs.
description.german: Betreten Sie die Katakomben.
description.french: Entrez dans les catacombes.
description.spanish: Adéntrate en las catacumbas.
description.schinese: 进入地穴。
description.brazilian: Entre nas criptas.

description.english: Defeat the Greater Demon of the Catacombs.
description.german: Besiegen Sie den Höheren Dämon in den Katakomben.
description.french: Battez le démon majeur des catacombes.
description.spanish: Derrota al gran demonio de las catacumbas.
description.schinese: 击败地穴里的大恶魔。
description.brazilian: Derrote o Demônio Superior das criptas.

description.english: Enter the Library.
description.german: Betreten Sie die Bibliothek.
description.french: Entrez dans la bibliothèque.
description.spanish: Accede a la biblioteca.
description.schinese: 进入图书馆。
description.brazilian: Entre na biblioteca.

description.english: Enter the Tomb of the Accursed.
description.german: Betreten Sie das Grabmal der Verfluchten.
description.french: Entrez dans le tombeau de la Maudite.
description.spanish: Adéntrate en la Tumba de la Maldita.
description.schinese: 进入受诅咒者之墓。
description.brazilian: Entre na Tumba da Amaldiçoada.

description.english: Defeat Lillian Shelby, The Accursed One.
description.german: Besiegen Sie Lillian Shelby, die Verfluchte.
description.french: Battez Lillian Shelby, la Maudite.
description.spanish: Derrota a Lillian Shelby, la Maldita.
description.schinese: 击败受诅咒者莉莲·谢尔比。
description.brazilian: Derrote Lilian Shelby, a Amaldiçoada.

description.english: Complete the game on Easy or higher.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel auf Leicht oder höher ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu au moins en mode facile.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad Fácil o superior.
description.schinese: 在简单或更难模式下通关游戏。
description.russian: Пройдите игру на низкой сложности или выше.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo no Fácil ou superior.

description.english: Complete the game on Normal or higher.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel auf Normal oder höher ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu au moins en mode normal.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad Normal o superior.
description.schinese: 在正常或更难模式下通关游戏。
description.russian: Пройдите игру на средней сложности или выше.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo no Normal ou superior.

description.english: Complete the game on Hard.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel auf Schwer ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode difficile.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad Difícil.
description.schinese: 在困难模式下通关游戏。
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo no Difícil.

description.english: Complete the game on any difficulty without using any healing items.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel auf einem beliebigen Schwierigkeitsgrad ab, ohne Heilgegenstände zu benutzen.
description.french: Terminez le jeu dans n'importe quelle difficulté sans utiliser d'objets de guérison.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en cualquier dificultad sin usar objetos de curación.
description.schinese: 不使用任何治疗物品，在任意难度模式下通关游戏。
description.russian: Пройдите игру на любой сложности, не используя никаких лечащих предметов.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo em qualquer dificuldade sem usar nenhum item de cura.

description.english: Complete the game on any difficulty in under 45 minutes.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel auf einem beliebigen Schwierigkeitsgrad in weniger als 45 Minuten ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en n'importe quelle difficulté en moins de 45 minutes.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en cualquier dificultad en menos de 45 minutos.
description.schinese: 在任意难度模式下45分钟内通关游戏。
description.russian: Пройдите игру на любой сложности менее, чем за 45 минут.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo em qualquer dificuldade em menos de 45 minutos.

description.english: Create the Antiseptic bandage.
description.german: Stellen Sie den Antiseptischen Verband her.
description.french: Créez le bandage antiseptique.
description.spanish: Crea una venda antiséptica.
description.schinese: 造出灭菌绷带。
description.brazilian: Crie o curativo antisséptico.

description.english: Kill an enemy using melee.
description.german: Töten Sie einen Gegner im Nahkampf.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi en combat de mêlée.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo en cuerpo a cuerpo.
description.schinese: 近战杀死一名敌人。
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo em combate corpo a corpo.

description.english: Kill an enemy using the Axegun.
description.german: Töten Sie einen Gegner mit der Pistolenaxt.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi à l'aide du pistolet-hache.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo usando el hacha pistola.
description.schinese: 用斧枪杀死一名敌人。
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo usando a arma com machadinha.

description.english: Kill an enemy using the Shotgun.
description.german: Töten Sie einen Gegner mit der Schrotflinte.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi à l'aide du fusil de chasse.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo usando la escopeta.
description.schinese: 用霰弹枪杀死一名敌人。
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo usando a espingarda.

description.english: Kill an enemy using the Pistol.
description.german: Töten Sie einen Gegner mit der Pistole.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi à l'aide du pistolet.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo usando la pistola.
description.schinese: 用手枪杀死一名敌人。
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo usando a pistola.

description.english: Read all notes in a single playthrough.
description.german: Lesen Sie in einem einzigen Durchgang alle Notizen.
description.french: Lisez toutes les notes en une seule partie.
description.spanish: Lee todas las notas en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在一次游戏中读遍所有记录。
description.russian: Прочитайте все записи за одно прохождение игры.
description.brazilian: Leia todas as anotações em um único jogo.

description.english: Kill an enemy using the Flintlock repeater.
description.german: Töten Sie einen Gegner mit dem Steinschlossmehrlader.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi à l'aide du pistolet à silex à répétition.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo usando la pistola de chispa de repetición.
description.schinese: 用连射燧发枪杀死一名敌人。
description.russian: Убейте врага, используя кремневку с магазином.
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo usando o Repetidor de pederneira.

description.english: Complete the game on Nightmare.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel auf Albtraum ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode Cauchemar.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en Pesadilla.
description.schinese: 在噩梦模式下通关游戏。
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo no Pesadelo.
